definition: to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: Rewards for past good deeds will be yours.
sentences.chinese: 往時的善事會給帶來報答。

sentences.english: I didn't know it ; just I wmainly continually because destined to continually become your momma .
sentences.chinese: 往時我並不知道，但我必定做你媽媽。

sentences.english: Please ask her to call me back when she's back.
sentences.chinese: 她回往時請爭她給我回個電話。
往時的事是不可以改造的。

sentences.english: Ihave forgotten much of the Latin I once knew.
sentences.chinese: 我往時懂拉丁語，此刻大都忘了。

sentences.english: I will forget. until they no longer remember the past things.
sentences.chinese: 我會遺忘，直到自身不再記起那些往時的事。
